channel.title: Requesting Banhammer
channel.description: Ive found that the best way to quit something is to get banned from it. I want to be done with Moparscape, but I cant quit, so I would like to be banned....

item.title: Requesting Banhammer
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:10, topic:338438”]Are you 100% sure?
I’ll probably ban you for 18 months so you can always come back if you change your mind. If you properly moved on you wont even bother to visit the site in 1 and half years.[/quote]

Go for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Banhammer
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:8, topic:338438”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=434827.msg3193223#msg3193223 date=1272487893]

IIRC you can’t request bans. May I ask why you’re leaving?

I stopped caring…
[/quote]Guess why most people commit suicide. Are you saying you would commit suicide if you stopped caring?

I never said what I stopped caring about now did I?[/quote]Nor did I infer what you stopped caring about.

Read full topic
